      • toDate

        public static java.util.Date toDate(java.lang.String date,
                                    java.lang.Boolean accurate)
                             throws java.text.ParseException
        A method that could convert Date object to String
        Parameters:
        date - the date string
        accurate - if this flag is true, the date string should be accurate to minute(yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm) or else it should be accurate to day(yyyy-MM-dd)
        Returns:
        date object
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
